KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Directory compareLT 005
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareGT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT function to compare two Directories and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each Directory are compared to determine whether one Directory is lesser than the other.

Syntax.Note: The first Directory is greater than the second Directory.
